account.introduction: Welcome to 121. Please log in below.
account.wrong-credentials: Your email and/or password are not recognized. Please try again.
account.no-connection: Not able to access the server. Please check your internet connection and try again later.
account.unequal-passwords: The passwords you provided are not the same. Please try again.

main-menu.introduction: The following actions are available. Please select one.

download-data.downloading: Validation data is being downloaded. Wait a second.
download-data.download-result: Validation data downloaded for {{nrDownloaded}} Persons Affected.
download-data.download-aborted: No validation data could be downloaded at this time. Please try again later.

view-appointments.introduction: For the following timeslots appointments have been scheduled. Select a timeslot to see details.
view-appointments.no-appointments: No appointments have been scheduled yet. Returning to main menu.
view-appointments.appointments: These are the appointments for the chosen timeslot:

scan-qr.introduction: Scan QR-code to retrieve PA's information.
scan-qr.error: The scanned QR-code did not contain a DID or program-ID.
scan-qr.unknownDidCombination: QR-code not found. You can try scanning another QR-code.
scan-qr.conclusion: Thank you. You have scanned a valid combination of DID and program-ID.

upload-data.uploading: Validation data is being uploaded for {{nrStored}} Persons Affected. Wait a second.
upload-data.no-upload-data-stored: There is no validation data to upload. Please validate someone first.
upload-data.upload-aborted: No validation data could be uploaded at this time. Please try again later.

validate-program.introduction: Below you see the PA's information for the specific program. Check it with the PA, adapt where necessary, and confirm.
validate-program.dob-feedback: The date of birth does not have a valid format. Please adjust and save again.
validate-program.please-confirm: Below is an overview of the PA's information. Please confirm.
validate-program.conclusion: The validation data has been saved. Please make sure to upload it (now or when internet is available).

validate-fsp.introduction: Below you see the PA's information for the specific program. Check it with the PA, adapt where necessary, and confirm.
validate-fsp.dob-feedback: The date of birth does not have a valid format. Please adjust and save again.
validate-fsp.please-confirm: Below is an overview of the PA's information. Please confirm and submit.
validate-fsp.no-fsp: There are no FSP to validate
validate-fsp.conclusion: The financial service provider data has been saved. Please make sure to upload it (now or when internet is available).

connection.error-retry: Something went wrong, do you want to try again?

shared.validate-generic-error: We cannot process some of your input. Please check and update one of your answers.
shared.validate-phoneNumber: We couldn't verify that phone-number. Please update and try again.
